name.description: name of the unit. e.g. ml_interface

head.description: Whether this unit is the first one to be executed.

flowchartId.description: Identity of the unit in the workflow. Used to trace the execution flow of the workflow.

next.description: Next unit's flowchartId. If empty, the current unit is the last.

results.description: Resulting properties extracted from the unit.

interface.description: Contains information about the ML interface unit..

modelfit.description: Contains information about the ML modelfit unit.

predict.description: Contains information about the ML predict unit.
